A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible.  If you love star wars and know the lore\, you will hate this movie. It successfully  spits in the face of old characters and fans. This money grab film filled with bad jokes\, major plot holes\, and an \" I can make it bigger while destroying the old\" attitude is not worth your time. I want my money and time back. Valarian was much better than the garbage they put on film.
